feed.title: Lab Dash Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New network monitor in system monitor (requires docker-compose update - see release)
  • Allow editing and removing gauges from system monitor widget
  • show multiple changelogs in recently updated modal
  • add recently updated badge
  • fix sticky icon hover animation on mobile
  • fix issue with multiple refresh tokens in browser (unexpected logouts)
  • auto refresh inactive sessions for pihole, check refresh token expiration before logging out user
  • update docs, fix deluge login failure loop, check health every 2 min, fix health check false positives, update explanation for SECRET in docker compose
  • dont require username for deluge
  • add private vulnerability reporting
  • Update issue templates
  • add security policy and code of conduct policy
  • unmount modals instead of keeping mounted

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.6
entry.content:
What's changed

  • New dual widget - stacks 2 widgets on top of each other
  • Optional additional health check url for all shortcuts (supports pinging hosts)
  • Auto retry logic for all widgets
  • Lab Dash API rate limiting (prevents the backend from getting overloaded with requests)
  • Allow setting city/state/country/zip for date time widget -- world clock support
  • Add kubernetes helm chart
  • Add arm v7 support

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.7
entry.content:
What's changed

  • fix deluge auto login after refresh
  • fix weather tooltip
  • use consistent icons for upload and download

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.1.8
entry.content:
What's changed

  • added support for multiple dashboard pages
  • added group widget which can be used to group shortcuts together in widget and dual widget sizes
  • added transmission client
  • added image upload manager in settings
  • added support for duplicating items
  • added toast messages instead of popup messages in some cases
  • added icons in edit menu
  • allow health shortcuts urls without navigation link
  • allow editing and removing pages from the menu bar
  • security improvements
  • bug fixes

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's changed

  • allow spaces in page names
  • fix a timeout issue for pihole inside dual widget
